## Resource Database

Use the filter/search options below to explore my collated resources.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

data <- read.csv("resources.csv")

data_cat <- data %>% pull(Category)

data_type <- data %>% pull(Type)


```



```{ojs}
//| panel: input
viewof islands = Inputs.checkbox(
  ["R", "Job Search", "QGIS"], 
  { value: ["R", "Job Search", "QGIS"], label: "Categories:" }
)

viewof types = Inputs.checkbox(
  ["Website", "eBook", "YouTube"],
  { value: ["Website", "eBook", "YouTube"], label: "Types:" }
)

```

```{ojs}
//| include: false
data = FileAttachment("resources.csv").csv({ typed: true })

filtered = data.filter(penguin => {
  return islands.includes(penguin.Category) && types.includes(penguin.Type)
})

// Update table data when filtered data changes
Reactable.setData('tbl', filtered)
```

```{r}
library(reactable)

data <- read.csv("resources.csv")

reactable(
  data,
  wrap = FALSE,
  resizable = TRUE,
  searchable = TRUE,
  striped = TRUE,
  defaultPageSize = 20,
  paginationType = "simple",
  showPageInfo = FALSE,
  minRows = 1,
  elementId = "tbl"
)
```
